strings: <Cap><hero> takes the sand of serenity out of the bag.

<voice_0x010010AE><se_low>Baumren: Hmmm!? Th-That powder!?
Where did you get that powder!?

<voice_0x010010AF><se_low>Baumren: What!?
Master Felix gave it to you?
This is unbelievable...

<voice_0x010010B0><se_low>Baumren: Of course...
Now I finally understand...
<voice_0x010010B1><se_low>Baumren: I thought it was a bit strange. I just kept going round and round and round in circles.
<voice_0x010010B2><se_low>Baumren: You've been a great help. If you hadn't come, I might have been wandering around here forever.
<voice_0x010010B3><se_low>Baumren: Would you mind opening that bottle and sprinkling the powder around?
<Cap><hero> sprinkles the sand of serenity in the air.
<voice_0x010010B4><se_low>Baumren: If you see Master Felix again, I'd like you to give him a message from me.
<voice_0x010010B5><se_low>Baumren: Tell him that I...Baumren...owe a lifetime of happiness entirely to him.
<voice_0x010010B6><se_low>Baumren: Farewell, and good health on your journey.
<se_low>Baumren: I came out here on an errand for my master, Felix, but I seem to have lost my way.

<se_low>Baumren: I know it's probably a strange thing to ask,
but perhaps you know? Where is it I'm supposed to be going...?
Offer Baumren the sand of serenity?
